Key Match Events: Sri Lanka won by 2 wickets with 4 balls remaining.
Kusal Mendis was named Player of the Match for his 60 runs off 37 balls and 2 catches.
Mehidy Hasan Miraz scored 38 runs off 26 balls for Bangladesh.
Afif Hossain contributed 39 runs off 22 balls for Bangladesh.
Taskin Ahmed took 2 wickets for 24 runs in 4 overs for Bangladesh.
Ebadot Hossain took 3 wickets for 51 runs in 4 overs for Bangladesh.
Dasun Shanaka scored 45 runs off 33 balls for Sri Lanka.
Kusal Mendis scored 60 runs off 37 balls for Sri Lanka.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at Dubai International Cricket Stadium.
Sri Lanka won the toss and elected to field first.
Ebadot Hossain and Asitha Fernando made their T20I debuts.
